Travia test aðgangur

data.name: Nice Hotel
data.description:
Situated in Reykjavík, 1.5 km from Laugardalur Family Park, ODDSSON Hotel offers modern rooms with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is offered.

At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe. Family rooms are available.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hotel ODDSSON.

Local buses stop across the street. Kringlan Shopping Centre is 1,5 km away. Hallgrímskirkja Church is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while Solfar Sun Voyager is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Reykjavík Domestic Airport, 5 km from ODDSSON Hotel.
